title: Alien Game Sound Effects
description: Alien Game Sound Effects library is 650 extra-terrestrial sound effects, all royalty-free, Includes big explosion sounds, alien creature voices, robot voices, futuristic weapon sounds, plasma pistol shots, blaster gun sounds, alien ships and more!
longDescription:
Audio Demos

Out-of-this-world Sound Effects Pack

Set your thrusters to overdrive – we’re going to the final frontier, earthlings! 

Alien Game is an all original, out-of-this-world, intergalactic, sci-fi sound effects collection. Complete with the essentials needed to achieve your sci-fi game dreams! Includes over 650 extra-terrestrial sound effects, to the tune of 4.28 GB.

Get Professional Results at Light Speed

This library is organized into popular categories that make it easier to create outstanding sci-fi game experiences in the following folders: Alien Footsteps, Alien Mechanisms – like airlocks, robotics, space doors, Ambiences (full length & loop-able), Crafting, Explosions, Explosions Distant, User Interface, Voices Alien, Voices Robots, Weapons. Useful in animations, videos games, arcades, apps, motions graphics, film, tv & more. Alien Game sound effects library is great for prototyping at light speed or instantly ready for final mixing into your project. Instant professionally produced results

A cosmic collection that includes: big explosions, alien creatures, robot voices, futuristic weapons, plasma pistol shots, alien cannons, blasters, gun handling, crafting actions and UI essentials, transitions, movements, trills, blings, positive & negative confirms, notifications, alerts, and loop-able ambiences for engines, spaceships, room-tones, alien robotics, mechanisms, airlocks, vault doors, mechanical sequences, teleportation FX, distant bombs, big and small footsteps, shiny items, glitchy mech collects, hi-tech assets, stock inventory, material pick ups and even more.
technicalDetails:
Product Details

  • 651 science fiction sounds and effects
  • 4.28 GB of game sound
  • AAA Sci-fi game sound effects library
  • Perfect for sci-fi fantasy, adventure RPG, MMO & action genres
  • 24 footsteps – big, hunter, insect, small
  • 51 robotic FX like airlocks, industrial mechanisms, ship doors, vaults, teleports & more
  • 40 full length ambiences for environments, inside ships, industrial soundscapes, engines, room tones & more
  • 40 loop-able ambiences derived from the full length soundscapes – all game-ready!
  • 122 crafting essentials – inventory items, collects, sci-fi pick ups, jewels, med packs, crystals & so much more
  • 35 sci-fi explosions – electric shockwave, grenade, photon blast, plasma bomb, forcefield etc.
  • 32 distant explosions – perfect for adding weight & sweetening impacts, blasts & more
  • 75 user interface sounds – sci-fi notifications, alerts, confirmations, holograms, holographic beep, chimes, chirps, computing, blings, trills, negative, positive
  • 64 alien voice sounds – big alien, hunter, insect, small – all have sets of hurt, attack, idle, death
  • 51 robot voice sounds – micro-bot, big bot, alien bot – all have sets of hurt, attack, idle, death + command voice – great for RTS games.
  • 116 weapon sounds & gun foley for laser, electric pistol, alien cannon, plasma pistol, plasma, cannon, zap gun


Number of Audio Waves: 651

Number of Audio Cues: 651

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes, some

Minutes of audio provided: 120

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
